Class.name: MDX2JSON.REST
Class.Description:
Class for REST-like web api for MDX2JSON transformation (and XML/A).
Example: send HTTP POST request to web application with Dispatch class MDX2JSON.REST with body: { "MDX":"QUERY" }, where QUERY is a correct MDX statement, ex:
{
"MDX": "SELECT NON EMPTY [Product].[P1].[Product Category].Members ON 0,NON EMPTY [Outlet].[H1].[Region].Members ON 1 FROM [HoleFoods]"
}
You can send requests to:
  • webapplication/test - to get test info, %request, %response
  • webapplication/MDX - to get result in JSONP format for MDX query
  • webapplication/MDXDrillthrough - to get resulting listing in JSON format for MDX Drillthrough query
  • webapplication/MDX2XMLA - to get result in XML/A format for MDX query
To get information about possible Cube's filters and filter's values:
  • webapplication/FilterValues/:cube - to get all filters for DeepSee Cube in JSON format.
  • webapplication/FilterValues/:cube/:filter - to get all values for Filter for DeepSee Cube in JSON format.
Example: send HTTP GET request to web application with Dispatch class MDX2JSON.REST and URL:
/FilterValues/HoleFoods/[DateOfSale].[Actual].[MonthSold] - to get information about possible values of [DateOfSale].[Actual].[MonthSold] in HoleFoods Cube.

XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data:
<Routes> <!-- Send objects in this format: {"MDX":"QUERY"} HTTP method: POST --> <Route Url="/MDX" Method="POST" Call="WriteJSONfromMDX"/> <Route Url="/MDX2JSONP" Method="POST" Call="WriteJSONPfromMDX"/> <Route Url="/MDXDrillthrough" Method="POST" Call="WriteDrillthroughJSON"/> <Route Url="/MDX2XMLA" Method="POST" Call="WriteXMLAfromMDX"/>
<!-- Get info about availible filters and their values --> <Route Url="/FilterValues/:cube" Method="GET" Call="WriteFiltersForCube"/> <Route Url="/FilterValues/:cube/:filter" Method="GET" Call="WriteFilterValues"/>
<!-- Valid but illicit, do not use--> <Route Url="/MDX/:query" Method="GET" Call="WriteJSONfromMDXURL"/> <Route Url="/MDXfilters/:query" Method="GET" Call="WriteFiltersForMDX"/>
<!-- Test method--> <Route Url="/test" Method="GET" Call="Test"/> </Routes>

Method.name: WriteDrillthroughJSON
Method.Description:
Wrapper for ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).WriteDrillthroughJSON(pMDX).
Converts incoming request object and calls abovementioned method.
Method.Implementation: set st = $$$OK set obj = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set st = ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonProvider).%ConvertJSONToObject(%request.Content,,.obj,1) quit:$$$ISERR(st) st set st = ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).WriteDrillthroughJSON(obj.MDX) quit st

Method.name: WriteJSONfromMDXURL
Method.Implementation: set MDX = $ZCONVERT($ZCONVERT(MDX ,"I","URL") ,"I","UTF8") set st = ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).WriteJSONfromMDX(MDX) quit st

Method.name: WriteFiltersForMDX
Method.Implementation: set MDX = $ZCONVERT($ZCONVERT(MDX ,"I","URL") ,"I","UTF8") set st = ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).WriteFiltersForMDX(MDX) quit st

Method.name: WriteFiltersForCube
Method.Implementation: set Cube = $ZCONVERT($ZCONVERT(Cube ,"I","URL") ,"I","UTF8") set st = ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).WriteFiltersForCube(Cube) quit st

Method.name: WriteFilterValues
Method.Implementation: set Cube = $ZCONVERT($ZCONVERT(Cube ,"I","URL") ,"I","UTF8") set Filter = $ZCONVERT($ZCONVERT(Filter ,"I","URL") ,"I","UTF8") set st = ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).WriteFilterValues(Cube, Filter) quit st

Method.name: WriteJSONfromMDX
Method.Description: Wrapper for ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).WriteJSONPfromMDX(pMDX) Converts incoming request object and calls abovementioned method.
Method.Implementation: d %response.SetHeader("Access-Control-Allow-Origin","*") set st = $$$OK set obj = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set st = ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonProvider).%ConvertJSONToObject(%request.Content,,.obj,1) quit:$$$ISERR(st) st set st = ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).WriteJSONfromMDX(obj.MDX) quit st

Method.name: WriteJSONPfromMDX
Method.Description: Wrapper for ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).WriteJSONPfromMDX(pMDX) Converts incoming request object and calls abovementioned method.
Method.Implementation: d %response.SetHeader("Access-Control-Allow-Origin","*") set st = $$$OK set obj = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set st = ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonProvider).%ConvertJSONToObject(%request.Content,,.obj,1) quit:$$$ISERR(st) st set st = ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).WriteJSONPfromMDX(obj.MDX) quit st

Method.name: WriteXMLAfromMDX
Method.Description: Wrapper for ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).WriteXMLAfromMDX(pMDX) Converts incoming request object and calls abovementioned method.
Method.Implementation: set st=$$$OK set obj = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set st = ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonProvider).%ConvertJSONToObject(%request.Content,,.obj,1) quit:$$$ISERR(st) st set st = ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).WriteXMLAfromMDX(obj.MDX) quit st
